transcript.speaker: Korben Dallas
transcript.message: I'm going to go get some food.

transcript.speaker: Korben Dallas
transcript.message: No, you stay here. I'll be back in a few minutes.

transcript.speaker: Korben Dallas
transcript.message: No, you should stay with Leeloo.

output.comment: The Silver Sword is a legendary sword that was forged by the dwarves of the mountain range. It is said that the sword was forged from the tears of the gods themselves.

transcript.speaker: Korben Dallas
transcript.message: What do you want to eat? [Pizza] [Burgers] [Salad]

transcript.speaker: Korben Dallas
transcript.message: You got it. One pizza, coming right up.
I've had enough, Sarah. It's time to do business.
Yes, it is time. What business exactly?
You know what I'm talking about.
You abandoned our party to die. And everyone did. Even me. I wasted almost a week grinding to get back to my level.
Oh, well, that's how it is. Now if you're here to challenge me, I'll gladly help you waste a few more weeks!

messages.speaker: New NPC
